description: This Public Disgrace shoot is both EPIC and AWESOME! If more humiliation is what you want, more humiliation is what you get in this weeks update. Within minutes of entering the bar our little whore is covered in spit and beer, struggling for air in predicament bondage, and pushed to the ground to lick dirty shoes clean. Lots of involvement from bar goers, and just an all around amazing shoot!
title: Total Awesomeness
